name: Pumpkin spice Frappuccino Vegan Recipe
description: Pumpkin spice Frappuccino Vegan Recipe. This easy frappuccino has pumpkin pie spice, almond milk, coffee and ice. Few ingredients and perfect. Top with whipped coconut cream.
recipeIngredient: a generous pinch of nutmeg and allspice
1 tsp instant coffee or a shot of espresso
1 cup almond milk ice cubes (frozen almond milk or 1/2 cup vegan vanilla ice cream)
sweetener to taste (coconut sugar, stevia or 4 to 5 soaked dates)
Variation: add a Tbsp of pumpkin puree.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender add everything. Blend to combine. Taste adjust sweet. Serve.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender add everything. Blend to combine. Taste adjust sweet. Serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust quantities to preference, add more or less cinnamon.add more ice cubes and less almond milk for an icy slushie. Add only ice cream and almond milk for a creamy shake.
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust quantities to preference, add more or less cinnamon.add more ice cubes and less almond milk for an icy slushie. Add only ice cream and almond milk for a creamy shake.

recipeInstructions.text: Top it with whipped coconut cream or a scoop of vegan ice cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Top it with whipped coconut cream or a scoop of vegan ice cream.
